explains: v. 行军；前进；使同行；游行示威；无法阻挡地行进（march 的现在分词）
wordGroup: marching band 军乐队；奏进行曲作操练表演的乐队

sentences.en: The street resounded to the thud of marching feet.
sentences.cn: 街道上回荡着行进步伐的铿锵声。

sentences.en: A U.S. infantry battalion was marching down the street.
sentences.cn: 一个美军步兵营沿着街道行进。

sentences.en: If you are marching, stop marching.
sentences.cn: 如果你正在行军，请停止前行。
